UserProfile.description: User Profile model class containing user data

phone.description: Phone number associated with this user.

first_name.description: First name associated with this user.

last_name.description: Last name associated with this user.

qrcode.description: Unique QR code identifying this user.

birth_date.description: Date of birth associated with this user.

language.description: Primary language assocaited with this user.

country_code.description: Country code associated with this user.

profile_photo.description: Profile photo url associated with this user.

created_at.description: Date the account for this user was created.

updated_at.description: Date the account for this user was last updated.

enabled.description: Denotes whether this account has been enabled.

email_verified.description: Denotes whether the email address for this user has been verified.

phone_verified.description: Denotes whether the phone number for this user has been verified.

UserProfileData.description: User Profile model class containing user data

tier_progress.description:
User's tier progress and status. If a user's tier status is
statically fixed, this will be null as they do not progress from
tier to tier.

referral_programs.description: A list of referral programs the user has access to.

points.description: The number of points this user currently has.

giftcard.description: The amount of store credit in the users' e-wallet.

name.description: The name of this tier level.

reach_spend.description: The amount of money spent required to reach this tier.

reach_visits.description: The amount of visits made to reach this tier.

reach_points.description: The amount of points acquired that is required to reach this tier.

start_date.description: The start date for this tier session.

end_date.description:
The end date for this tier session.
The tier will be reset once this date is reached.

tier_level.description: The name of the user's current tier level

tier_level_live.description:
The name of the user's current tier level.
Tiers are recalculated once per day, as such "tier_level" may
not be completely up to date.

next_tier_level.description: The name of the user's next tier level.

tier_progress.description:
The users current tier progress in their "tier_level".
This will be a number between 0 and 1. A tier progress of 0.5
means that the user has made 50% progress in their current tier.

left_points.description:
The amount of points left in the user's current tier progress.
Once they have acquired this many more amount of points, they
will be moved into the next tier.

TierProgress.description:
Represents a users' tier progress within their current tier.
This also includes other useful information about the tier such as start
and end dates, as well as the next tier the user will reach.

id.description: The unique id of this referral program.

cond_min_amount.description: The minimum purchawe amount required for a succesful referral.

referee_earns.description: The number of points the new customer will earn.

referer_earns.description: The number of points the new customer who made the referral will earn.

expires_in.description:
The number of days the new customer has to sign up in
order for a referral to be sucessful.

enabled.description: Denotes whether this referral program is currently active.

link_referral_enabled.description:
Denotes whether this referral program has enabled share links.
Referral share links are links that the customer can send to prospective
referrals. A User can sign up to the business through this link in order to
complete the referral.

referral_link.description: A link that can be shared to prospective referrals.
